row.string: issue.summary = replica.summary issue.description = replica.description issue.labels = replica.labels issue.comments = commentHelper.mergeComments(issue, replica) issue.attachments = attachmentHelper.mergeAttachments(issue, replica)

issue.projectKey = "BESU" issue.typeName = nodeHelper.getIssueType(replica.type?.name, issue.projectKey)?.name ?: "Improvement" issue.summary = replica.summary issue.description = replica.description issue.labels = replica.labels issue.comments = commentHelper.mergeComments(issue, replica) issue.attachments = attachmentHelper.mergeAttachments(issue, replica)

replica.key = issue.key replica.type = issue.type replica.creator = issue.creator replica.reporter = issue.reporter replica.assignee = issue.assignee replica.summary = issue.summary replica.description = issue.description replica.labels = issue.labels replica.comments = issue.comments replica.resolution = issue.resolution replica.status = issue.status replica.parentId = issue.parentId replica.priority = issue.priority replica.attachments = issue.attachments replica.project = issue.project
Link to Sync the Hyperledger Besu project in Hyperledger Jira with PegaSys Jira
